metadata.name: Enter the Crustlands
metadata.description:
OPEN EDITION of the first stage entering the CRUSTLANDS universe.

The CRUSTLANDS is an experimental plane of existence that holds a weird tangled mess of characters, machinery, and landscapes that power the central mind-core. Future pieces will develop more of this unique place.

Illustration and animation created with Clip Studio and AE provided some movement with an added a layer of eeriness of various synth experiments.

Each token collected will be entered in a raffle for a chance to win  a 1:1 illustration.
